Date: 2024-11-15 15:11
Subject: Have You Completed Our Mandatory Trainings?
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/K6rx4Hgwoka7Y1xe2omzbQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	

HAVE YOU COMPLETED OUR MANDATORY TRAININGS?


Throughout the year we have communicated about different trainings and policies which require your attention and action.

This is a kind reminder to ensure you have completed the following trainings as soon as possible!

Lost track of which trainings you've completed? 
Here's a simple check list to follow:

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/K6rx4Hgwoka7Y1xe2omzbQ/550406/58EF5C71A267F8C62DBA45514B173D31/info-sec-01.png> 	
As we continue to grow and strengthen our online and offline presence, we are aware that cyber threats are more prevalent than ever.

We count on you to protect the Group’s information! Make sure to read our Information Security Charter and sign the mandatory Acceptable Use Policy.

COMPLETE NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fcourse%252fview.php%253fid%253d3313%2526stoploop%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWRZILNQW59lpd%252fqLAY8tOSFvew3RBXIlve9DHUOQ%252fbhmJmRS6nLVtAqBHwpuCKFS1nH1c9ObV8V4W7ExswEdWKZ10GjxYcyOcEjBuNy0elAN8qWAWvPh7%252fZZGv0g%252bI2O%252bGxH2nS%252b%252bSwA0EkygKSy%252fIXThNFkRTNXHKln6gXysAZJO6%252b2r3u2vVNkl5AhleIcYoN2FDpoOcX1%252bU45ZcyfW3YV4Hc%252bSD5PwufeRfOmK%252fTq&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cc55a43d242fd4c44755308dd05664649%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638672659021372811%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=NNKQ1X2%2FQIHW1cyShcMv2q4gicsLmMor0LTc1YUvnUk%3D&reserved=0>

Last year, we introduced the brand personality and tone of voice to set global standards for how we communicate. These guidelines help ensure we consistently and effectively align with our brand values and positioning. With the support of Chalhoub University, we've developed the mandatory Brand Personality and Tone of Voice online training. 

This training, supplemented by our visual and verbal guidelines, provides clear instructions on effective communication within our workplace and community. 

COMPLETE NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fchalhoubuniversity.com%252fcourse%252fview.php%253fid%253d3274%2526stoploop%253d0%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWRZILNQW59lpd%252fqLAY8tOSFvew3RBXIlve9DHUOQ%252fbhmJmRS6nLVtAqBHwpuCKFS1nH1c9ObV8V4W7ExswEdWKZ10GjxYcyOcEjBuNy0elAN8qWAWvPh7%252fZZGv0g%252bI2O%252bGxH2nS%252b%252bSwA0EkygKSy%252fIXThNFkRTNXHKln6gXysAZJO6%252b2r3u2vVNkl5AhleIcYoN2FDpoOcX1%252bU45ZcyfW3YV4Hc%252bSD5PwufeRfOmK%252fTq&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cc55a43d242fd4c44755308dd05664649%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638672659021435044%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=f5KEKxLMnMTgGJGPW6CjlC%2BEn97cooM8ygziMk3gtGw%3D&reserved=0>

duction is designed to empower you with the essential guidelines and best practices in our ongoing commitment to prioritise the Health, Safety, Security, and Environment (HSSE) of all team members. 

Safety is a shared responsibility, and it is important to ensure everyone is equipped with the knowledge to maintain a compliant work environment, contributing to creating a safer and more secure workplace for our Group.
